get.description: Get all users, should be accessed only by a user who has admin as a role

minAvg.description: How many applicants will this specialty have

isDependent.description: If true, this specialty depends on others. So customPercentage will decide how much percentage of other specialties should accept.

requestBody.description: if isDependent is true, customPercentage is required

get.description:
for (exported, broken) query params, the priority is for exported, then broken.
If you don't pass any of them, then items of inventory will be returned.
For response body, exported and broken don't have category

post.description:
for query params, the priority is for exported, then broken.
If you don't pass any of them, then will create an inventory item.
For request and response body, exported and broken don't have category

put.description:
for query params, the priority is for exported, then broken.
If you don't pass any of them, then will update inventory item

delete.description:
for query params, the priority is for exported, then broken.
If you don't pass any of them, then will delete inventory item

get.description:
for query params, the priority is for exported, then broken.
If you don't pass any of them, then will get an inventory item
For (responsible, room) query params, the priority for responsible then rooms. Ff none specified, then all lists will be returned
